aside.p: Fix the QualificationRequirement portion of the Mechanical Turk request and make qualifications be part of the configuration process. Add the facility to automatically submit bonuses to Mechanical Turk. This button is revealed after completion of the experiment if and only if the experiment is associated with AWS credentials. (Only Mechanical Turk players are notified of their bonus, of course.) Fix the Finish notification to Mechanical Turk to be through the gamelab system, not the client's browser: this behaviour is usually disallowed as a browser security option.
